Cheryl invited fans to have a glimpse into her haunted home for Halloween.

Spooky pictures captured the chilling touches the singer had made to her sprawling mansion to celebrate the occasion with her young son Bear.

It was a bone-tingling spectacle to behold as a huge skeleton sat by the fireplace surrounded by an army of skeleton dogs.

Creepy skulls were strewn all over her home as they were piled in buckets and placed along the sides.

Lots of cobwebs were hung from the fireplace to give the place an eerie atmophere.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Cheryl also had a feature piece made up of coloured baubles and pumpkins as she got in the spooky spirit for the festive season.

The songstress penned "come in" over her montage of Halloween snaps she shared with her fans on social media.

It comes after Cheryl was forced to deny she and Liam broke up in the January of 2018.

(Image: Instagram)

The Bedroom Floor hitmaker appeared to confirm the couple had already separated when they went public with their split in July 2018.

Liam also recently admitted he misses out on big moments with Bear because he is on tour. He said: "I don't know, I am quite excited to go out [on tour].

"It is difficult being on the road, going out and promo-ing. It has been hard to get home and see him. Loads of random things happen with kids all the time.

"Like if he's not very well, sometimes you miss dates and things. Then a couple of weeks go by, and I haven't seen him in ages.

"It hurts, I do want to go out on tour, I'm just going to have to figure out the schedule properly."
description: Cheryl has sprinkled skulls and skeletons around her home as she got into the spirit for Halloween
